arm_group.description: moxibustion treatment 3 times a week for 3 weeks

brief_summary.textblock:
There will be significant differences between control and experimental group after the
      moxibustion intervention as to, subjective physical symptoms and quality of life.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effects of Self-Moxibustion Therapy on Subjective Physical Symptoms and Health-related Quality of Life of the Elderly. The Effects of Self-Moxibustion Therapy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Male and female older adults age between 65-85

          -  Agree to participate and sign for the trail after understanding of study purpose, and
             method.

          -  Able to answer for questions by verbally or literally

          -  Able to participate in 2weeks after follow-up

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Having physical disorder such as thyroids, severe heart disease, dietetic mellitus,
             severe liver disease, allergy

          -  Subjects who can not attend more than 3 times of intervention session

          -  Subjects who are eligible by the decision of investigator

intervention.description: modernly developed moxibustion treatment device with safe cover on top of it.

clinical_study.official_title: The Effects of Self-Moxibustion Therapy on Subjective Physical Symptoms and Health-related Quality of Life of the Elderly.

overall_official.affiliation: Pusan National University School of Medicine
